item.title: Readings shared August 23, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on August 23, 2024 are

  • Readings shared August 22, 2024. #ITP #Agda #HoTT #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Lean: First steps (06 - Intermediate results). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • How to make mathematicians into programmers (and vice versa). ~ Will Crichton. #ITP #LeanProver #Math
  • Michael John Caldwell Gordon (FRS 1994), 28 February 1948 - 22 August 2017. ~ Lawrence C Paulson (@LawrPaulson@mathstodon.xyz). #ITP #HOL
  • Coproduct measure (in Isabelle/HOL). ~ Michikazu Hirata. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • A survey on deep learning for theorem proving. ~ Zhaoyu Li, Jialiang Sun, Logan Murphy, Qidong Su, Zenan Li, Xian Zhang, Kaiyu Yang & Xujie Si. #AI #DeepLearning #ITP
  • Property-based testing for the people. ~ Harrison Goldstein. #PhDThesis #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Boolean matrix logic programming. ~ Lun Ai & Stephen H. Muggleton. #LogicProgramming
  • Ordinals aren't much worse than Quaternions. ~ Philip Zucker (@sandmouth@types.pl). #Python #Math

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 8 de agosto de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 08 de agosto de 2024 son

  • Lecturas compartidas el 6 de agosto de 2024. #ITP #Coq #Python #FunctionalProgramming
  • #Calculemus: Demostraciones con Lean4 e Isabelle/HOL de "length(xs ++ ys) = length(xs) + length(ys)". #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • A survey on deep learning for theorem proving. ~ Zhaoyu Li, Jialiang Sun, Logan Murphy, Qidong Su, Zenan Li, Xian Zhang, Kaiyu Yang, Xujie Si. #ITP #DeepLearning
  • Getting started with Blueprint-Driven formalization projects in Lean. ~ Pietro Monticone (@PietroMonticone). #ITP #LeanProver #Lean4

item.description:
